Congregation 1.upgradeMessage: You begin your religion by having^weekly sermons in your basement

Congregation 2.upgradeMessage: After gaining some followers, you^begin renting a small building

Congregation 3.upgradeMessage: Your religious meeting place is^now gargantuan in size

Door to Door 1.upgradeMessage: You and your followers go^door to door to spread your word

Door to Door 2.upgradeMessage: You spend days recruiting^in neighboring regions

Door to Door 3.upgradeMessage: Some of your followers go^fulltime door to door recruiting

Missionaries 1.upgradeMessage: A few of your followers fly out to^distant regions to spread your word

Missionaries 2.upgradeMessage: Your followers are now assigned missionary^work to fulfill their faith

Missionaries 3.upgradeMessage: Your followers use private jets^to get around the country

Print 1.upgradeMessage: You put fliers out around^town about your religion

Print 2.upgradeMessage: The local newspaper writes a ^short article about your religion

Print 3.upgradeMessage: You're on the cover of^a popular magazine

Radio 1.upgradeMessage: You buy an ad on^local radio stations

Radio 2.upgradeMessage: You have an interview with^a popular radio host

Televangelism 1.upgradeMessage: You are interviewed by^the local news network

Televangelism 3.upgradeMessage: You buy an ad slot^for during the Superbowl

Divine Revelation.upgradeMessage: Your God begins revealing^himself to non-believers
